name: IDEA LAB Wordpress boilerplate theme
body:
### Wordpress boilerplate theme.
This is Wordpress boilerplate theme.
```
$ cd /wp-content/themes/your-project/
$ git clone git@github.com:kfeldmanis/idealab-wp-boilerplate.git .
$ compass watch /wp-content/themes/your-project/assets/
```

### Required tools
Compass - http://compass-style.org/

### Contributors
[kfeldmanis](https://github.com/kfeldmanis), [cherijs](https://github.com/cherijs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
